title: First Breath
topic: Installation, Setup, and Your First 'Hello World'
description_md: Write a Python script that prints exactly `Hello World` to the console.
test_code: import sys; from io import StringIO; saved_stdout = sys.stdout; sys.stdout = StringIO(); import main; output = sys.stdout.getvalue().strip(); sys.stdout = saved_stdout; assert output == 'Hello World'

title: The Number One
topic: Installation, Setup, and Your First 'Hello World'
description_md: Print the number `1` to the console.

title: Double Greeting

title: Variable Swap
topic: Variables and Simple Data Types (Integers, Floats)
description_md: Swap values of `a = 1` and `b = 2` using a temporary variable `temp`.
test_code: import main; assert main.a == 2 and main.b == 1
solution_code:
a = 1
b = 2
temp = a
a = b
b = temp

title: Swap Without Temp
topic: Variables and Simple Data Types (Integers, Floats)
description_md: Swap `x = 5` and `y = 10` in one line without a temp variable using tuple unpacking.
test_code: import main; assert main.x == 10 and main.y == 5
solution_code:
x = 5
y = 10
x, y = y, x

title: Boss Battle: Bill Splitter
topic: Variables and Simple Data Types (Integers, Floats)
description_md: `total_bill = 50.0`, `tip_pct = 0.20`, `people = 2`. Calculate `pay_per_person` (bill + tip) / people.
test_code: import main; assert main.pay_per_person == 30.0
solution_code:
total_bill = 50.0
tip_pct = 0.20
people = 2
total_pay = total_bill * (1 + tip_pct)
pay_per_person = total_pay / people

title: If Else
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: Set `age = 15`. If `age >= 18` set `status = "Adult"`, else set `status = "Minor"`.
test_code: import main; assert main.status == 'Minor'

title: Equality Check
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: Set `password = "secret"`. If `password == "secret"`, set `access = True`.
test_code: import main; assert main.access is True
solution_code:
password = "secret"
access = False
if password == "secret":
    access = True

title: Not Equal
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: Set `color = "Red"`. If `color != "Blue"`, set `is_blue = False`.
test_code: import main; assert main.is_blue is False
solution_code:
color = "Red"
is_blue = True
if color != "Blue":
    is_blue = False

title: Boolean Flag
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: Set `game_over = True`. If `game_over` is True, set `msg = "Ended"`.
test_code: import main; assert main.msg == 'Ended'

title: Negative Check
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: Set `temp = -5`. If `temp < 0`, set `freeze = True`.
test_code: import main; assert main.freeze is True
solution_code:
temp = -5
freeze = False
if temp < 0:
    freeze = True

title: Elif Basic
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: Set `score = 75`. If `score > 80` set `grade='A'`, elif `score > 70` set `grade='B'`.
test_code: import main; assert main.grade == 'B'

title: Modulo Check
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: Set `num = 4`. If `num % 2 == 0` set `even = True`.
test_code: import main; assert main.even is True
solution_code:
num = 4
even = False
if num % 2 == 0:
    even = True

title: Empty String
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: Set `name = ""`. If `not name`: set `valid = False`.
test_code: import main; assert main.valid is False
solution_code:
name = ""
valid = True
if not name:
    valid = False

title: Greater Than or Equal
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: Set `pass_mark = 50`, `my_mark = 50`. If `my_mark >= pass_mark`, set `passed = True`.
test_code: import main; assert main.passed is True
solution_code:
pass_mark = 50
my_mark = 50
passed = False
if my_mark >= pass_mark:
    passed = True

title: And Logic
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: Set `x = 5`, `y = 10`. If `x > 0` AND `y > 0`, set `both_pos = True`.
test_code: import main; assert main.both_pos is True
solution_code:
x = 5
y = 10
both_pos = False
if x > 0 and y > 0:
    both_pos = True

title: Or Logic
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: Set `day = "Sat"`. If `day == "Sat"` or `day == "Sun"`, set `weekend = True`.
test_code: import main; assert main.weekend is True
solution_code:
day = "Sat"
weekend = False
if day == "Sat" or day == "Sun":
    weekend = True

title: Elif Chain
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: Check `x = 0`. Elif `x > 0` -> `Pos`, `x < 0` -> `Neg`, else -> `Zero`. Store in `res`.
test_code: import main; assert main.res == 'Zero'

title: String Equality
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: Set `cmd = "START"`. If `cmd.lower() == "start"`, set `running = True`.
test_code: import main; assert main.running is True

title: Complex Boolean
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: Set `a=True`, `b=False`, `c=True`. If `(a or b) and c` is True, set `result = "Pass"`.
test_code: import main; assert main.result == 'Pass'

title: FizzBuzz Logic
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: Set `n = 15`. If div by 3 and 5 -> `FB`. Elif div by 3 -> `F`. Elif div by 5 -> `B`. Else `str(n)`. Store in `out`.
test_code: import main; assert main.out == 'FB'

title: Leap Year
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: Set `year = 2000`. If div by 400 -> True, elif div by 100 -> False, elif div by 4 -> True. Else False. Store in `leap`.
test_code: import main; assert main.leap is True

title: Truthiness
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: Set `items = []`. If `items` is empty (using truthiness `if not items`), set `status = "Empty"`.
test_code: import main; assert main.status == 'Empty'

title: One Line If
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: Use ternary operator: Set `status = "Go"` if `green` else `"Stop"`. `green = True`.
test_code: import main; assert main.status == 'Go'
solution_code:
green = True
status = "Go" if green else "Stop"

title: Nested Logic Gates
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: Set `age=20`, `has_id=True`. If `age >= 18`: if `has_id`: `entry=True`. Else `entry=False`.
test_code: import main; assert main.entry is True

title: Data Type Branching
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: Set `val = 3.5`. If `type(val) == int`: `kind="int"`, elif `type(val) == float`: `kind="float"`.
test_code: import main; assert main.kind == 'float'

title: String Contains
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: Set `email = "user@gmail.com"`. If `"@"` in `email` and `"."` in `email`, set `valid = True`.
test_code: import main; assert main.valid is True

title: None Check
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: Set `data = None`. If `data is None`, set `status = "No Data"`.
test_code: import main; assert main.status == 'No Data'

title: Logic Simplification
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: Set `x = 10`. Assign `check` to `True` if `x` is not 0, 5, or 7. (Use `not in`).
test_code: import main; assert main.check is True
solution_code:
x = 10
check = False
if x not in (0, 5, 7):
    check = True

title: Boss Battle: Login System
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: User=`admin`, Pass=`1234`. If both match -> `Access Granted`. If User wrong -> `Unknown User`. Else -> `Wrong Password`. Store in `msg`.
test_code: import main; assert main.msg == 'Wrong Password'

title: Boss Battle: Ticket Pricing
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: `age = 65`. Base price `$10`. < 12 free (`price=0`). >= 65 half (`price=5`). Else `price=10`. Store `price`.
test_code: import main; assert main.price == 5

title: Boss Battle: Triangle Validator
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: Sides `a=3, b=3, c=10`. Valid if sum of any 2 > 3rd. If valid, `res="Valid"`, else `res="Invalid"`.
test_code: import main; assert main.res == 'Invalid'

title: Boss Battle: Grade Curve
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: `score = 88`. If score < 90, add 2 points. Cap at 100 (if score > 100, set to 100). Final score in `final_s`.
test_code: import main; assert main.final_s == 90

title: Boss Battle: Rock Paper Scissors
topic: Control Flow (If, Elif, Else)
description_md: `p1="Rock"`, `p2="Scissors"`. Determine winner: `"P1"`, `"P2"`, or `"Draw"`. Rules: R>S, S>P, P>R.
test_code: import main; assert main.winner == 'P1'
